summary: Hubert Wolfe, a successful author who hasn't written anything for 10 years, is living a life of lies. He uses a ghostwriter named Dany-a prolific writer known for his genuineness of spirit ... See full summary »
cast: Michel Côté|Ras Kent|Robin Aubert|Antoine Bertrand|Maria de Medeiros|Anne Casabonne|Anna Hopkins|Denise Gagnon|Paul Savoie|Guy Sprung|Abdul Ayoola|Steve Barry|Marie Bernier|Simon Boulerice|Kenneth Kynt Bryan|Angelo Cadet|Alexandre Cadieux|Jason Cavalier|Nathan Clusiau-Tremblay|Evelyne de la Chenelière|Pierre-Marc Drouin|Divine Prince Ty Emmecca|Jon Eyez|Garry Gagnon|Zoé Gariépy|Jean-Alexandre Giguère|Carlos Ramónne Graham|Nicolas Guay|Mimoza Hajdini|Owen Harn|Sarah Jones|Éli Julien-Tremblay|Dominic Lapointe|Kosta Lapointe|Clara Leblond|Veronica Melis|Louka Milani|Annabelle Parent-Garcia|Salomée Paulo|Wayne Pére|Sonia Quirion|Aline Racine|Dane Rhodes|Benoît Rousseau|Delmaine Samuel|Kwasi Songui|Philippe Soucy|Carol Sutton|Jay Thames|Cindy Turmel|Ned Yousef
title: Les maîtres du suspense
